If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and also, inflicts Atk/Def-Y on foe during combat (Y = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat + 3; max 6), and also, if Y ≥ 5, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% during combat.
